src:
Klasemen La Liga: Barcelona dan Real Madrid Punya Poin Sama
03 Nov 2019, 05:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid dan Barcelona sama-sama gagal mendapat poin penuh pada pekan ke-12 La Liga 2019/2020. Bedanya, Real Madrid mendapatkan satu poin sedangkan Barcelona tidak mendapat poin sama sekali.
Barcelona berjumpa Levante pada laga pekan ke-11. Laga digelar di Estadio Ciudad de Valencia, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Barcelona sempat unggul lebih dulu lewat penalti Lionel Messi pada menit ke-38.
Akan tetapi, Barcelona remuk redam di babak kedua. Tiga gol bersarang di gawang Marc-Andre ter Stegen. Campagna, Borja Mayoral dan Nemanja Radoja bergantian membobol gawang kiper timnas Jerman. Barcelona kalah 3-1 dari Levante.
Real Madrid mendapat satu poin usai ditahan imbang Real Betis di Bernabeu. Madrid sempat mencetak gol lewat Eden Hazard, tetap dianulir wasit karena offside. Real Madrid kemudian tidak mampu mencetak gol ke gawang Betis. Hasil akhir 0-0, bukan raihan yang bagus untuk Real Madrid.
Tambahan satu poin membuat Real Madrid kini mengumpulkan 22 poin, sama dengan jumlah poin yang sudah didapatkan Barcelona. Namun, Real Madrid tetap berada di posisi kedua karena kalah selisih gol dari klub asal Catalan.
text:
La Liga Standings: Barcelona and Real Madrid Have the Same Points
Nov 3, 2019, 05:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid and Barcelona both failed to get full points in Week 12 of La Liga 2019/2020. The difference is, Real Madrid gets one point while Barcelona does not get any points at all.
Barcelona meet Levante in the Week 11 match. The match was held at the Estadio Ciudad de Valencia on Saturday (11/02/2019) evening hrs. Barcelona had superior first through a Lionel Messi penalty in the 38th minute.
However, Barcelona crushed in the second half. Three goals were found in Marc-Andre ter Stegen's goal. Campagna, Borja Mayoral and Nemanja Radoja took turns breaking into the German national team goalkeeper. Barcelona lost 3-1 to Levante.
Real Madrid got a point after being held to a Real Betis draw at the Bernabeu. Madrid had scored through Eden Hazard, the referee still disallowed because of offside. Real Madrid then were unable to score against Betis. The final result 0-0, not a good achievement for Real Madrid.
One additional point makes Real Madrid now collect 22 points, the same as the number of points that have been obtained by Barcelona. However, Real Madrid remain in second place because they have lost on goal difference from the Catalan club.
